android_event_type.TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED: A change to a visually distinct section of the user interface.
android_event_type.TYPE_WINDOW_CONTENT_CHANGED: Changing the content of a window.
android_event_type.TYPE_VIEW_FOCUSED: Setting input focus of a View.
android_event_type.TYPE_VIEW_CLICKED: Clicking on a View like Button, CompoundButton, etc.
android_event_type.TYPE_VIEW_TEXT_SELECTION_CHANGED: Changing the selection in an EditText.
android_event_type.TYPE_VIEW_TEXT_CHANGED: Changing the text of an EditText.
android_event_type.TYPE_VIEW_SELECTED: Selecting an item usually in the context of an AdapterView.
android_event_type.TYPE_VIEW_LONG_CLICKED: Long clicking on a View like Button, CompoundButton, etc.
android_event_type.TYPE_VIEW_HOVER_ENTER: A hover enter over a View.
android_event_type.TYPE_VIEW_HOVER_EXIT: A hover exit over a View.
